item.title: [DELTA] Project Clarent
item.dc:creator: @mock_pro mock pro
item.description:
@mock_pro wrote:

[quote=“teh war of noobs, post:2, topic:424736”]Name: Mitchai (Teh War Of Noobs)

Age: 15

Applying For: Server coder

Experience: I’ve been coding only Delta for 3 years now and quite enjoy it. I’ve learned quite a bit from youtube tutorials and tutorials on google. I have learned to do things like:

  • Pk point systems
  • Proper stances when wielding weapons
  • Working Doors
  • Preventing NPC clipping
  • Adding Tele-Other spells
  • 100% Dueling
  • All skill menu’s and interfaces
  • getting all skills to work 100%!
  • Adding TONS of different commands

And also some basic stuff like:

  • Making NPCs Move/Talk
  • NPC Dialogues
  • Teleporting Spells
  • Changing Starter packages
  • Changing Player Rights, Bank Items, Inventory Items ETC…

and a lot more! (:

Evidence of previous works:
Well i did post a starter package of basic coding on the server downloads a few years ago. I have got a lot better now. I also have been coding my own server, also delta with a nice RS 2006 Gameframe to it. Leveling up interfaces working, dueling 100% and much more. Unfortunately i was unable to host it because i didn’t have a VPS. Here are some screen shots of the server AND the link to my starter package of basic coding.

Starter Package: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,422596.0.html
Picture:

How Active will you be: I can be on every day after school from 4:00PM - 1:00AM and as long as i want on weekends! x)

MSN/Skype:
MSN: iHumpBeasts@hotmail.com
Skype: iHumpBeasts

hehe x) thanks for reading! i am looking forward to see what you guys think.[/quote]

pending

Read full topic

And also some basic stuff like:

  • Changing Player Rights, Bank Items, Inventory Items ETC…

and a lot more! (:

Evidence of previous works:
Well i did post a starter package of basic coding on the server downloads a few years ago. I have got a lot better now. I also have been coding my own server, also delta with a nice RS 2006 Gameframe to it. Leveling up interfaces working, dueling 100% and much more.
